examples: Although they have their differences, there's no denying that they share a lot of similarities - like mother, like daughter, they have a strong bond and connection.
So, similarity inherited from a common ancestor?
We have similarities in some of those departments.
What are the similarities?
The genetic similarities become more and more different.
words.defineEn: the state of having characteristics, appearances, qualities, etc. that are very alike but not the same
words.defineVi: trạng thái có đặc điểm, ngoại hình, phẩm chất, v.v. rất giống nhau nhưng không giống nhau

examples: The scholarship fund had made a difference in a lot of people's lives.
Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.
It could mean the difference between a red-letter day and an empty basket.
Make a difference by doing what?
He got the hook, reportedly due to differences with his co-star.
words.defineEn: the way that two or more people or things are different from each other
words.defineVi: cách mà hai hoặc nhiều người hoặc vật khác nhau

examples: Melissa's new book got off to a flying start, with high sales and positive reviews from readers and critics alike.
They look so alike and share the same quirky sense of humor.
As the saying goes, dogs of the same street bark alike.
They look so alike that it's easy to mix them up.
We've always shared and shared alike, haven't we?
words.defineEn: (of two or more things or people) having qualities, characteristics, appearances, etc. that are very similar but not identical
words.defineVi: (của hai hoặc nhiều vật hoặc người) có phẩm chất, đặc điểm, ngoại hình, v.v. rất giống nhau nhưng không giống nhau

examples: The two men reached the same conclusion.
The same thing happened to me.
All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.
Anyone in her shoes would have done the same thing.
The two chefs are not in the same league.
words.defineEn: like another thing or person in every way
words.defineVi: thích một thứ khác hoặc một người theo mọi cách

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
They both pay their employees badly.
She raised both arms above her head.
words.defineEn: used to talk about two things or people
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói về hai điều hoặc người

examples: But a truck driver saved her bacon.
My friends all had a good laugh, but at my expense.
but I have mixed feelings about him
A wonder lasts but nine days.
But this bird was as dead as a dodo.
words.defineEn: used for introducing a word, phrase, or idea that is different to what has already been said
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để giới thiệu một từ, cụm từ hoặc ý tưởng khác với những gì đã được nói
